benchmark_details.name: A Benchmark for the Detection of Metalinguistic Disagreements between LLMs and Knowledge Graphs
benchmark_details.overview: The paper proposes a benchmark for evaluating the detection of factual and metalinguistic disagreements between LLMs and knowledge graphs.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To create a benchmark for assessing metalinguistic disagreements between LLMs and knowledge graphs.

data.annotation: Human-annotated examples for metalinguistic disagreement detection

methodology.calculation: Calculated based on the agreement between LLM outputs and annotated examples.
methodology.interpretation: Indicators of metalinguistic disagreement versus factual disagreement.
methodology.validation: Need for human validation of LLM defined disagreements.
